title: installation problem [incorrectly launching conda envs]
body:
Hello!
I can't solve the problem.
I did all steps in that manual [https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut/blob/master/docs/installation.md]   and that https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut/blob/master/conda-environments/README.md .  After installation  I'm trying to import deeplabcut in the cmd and this error appears.
`(jane) C:\Users\Administrator>python
Python 3.6.8 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Feb 21 2019, 18:30:04) [MSC v.1916 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import deeplabcut
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\jane\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\__init__.py", line 29, in <module>
    from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
  File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\jane\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\__init__.py", line 18, in <module>
    from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.auxfun_drag_label import *
  File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\jane\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\auxfun_drag_label.py", line 19, in <module>
    import wx
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'wx'
>>> import deeplabcut
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\jane\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\__init__.py", line 29, in <module>
    from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
  File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\jane\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\__init__.py", line 18, in <module>
    from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.auxfun_drag_label import *
  File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\jane\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\auxfun_drag_label.py", line 19, in <module>
    import wx
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'wx'
>>> import tensorflow
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'numpy.core._multiarray_umath'
ImportError: numpy.core.multiarray failed to import

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 968, in _find_and_load
SystemError: <class '_frozen_importlib._ModuleLockManager'> returned a result with an error set
ImportError: numpy.core._multiarray_umath failed to import
ImportError: numpy.core.umath failed to import
2019-07-18 18:34:11.410519: F tensorflow/python/lib/core/bfloat16.cc:675] Check failed: PyBfloat16_Type.tp_base != nullptr`

Can you help me with that?
Thank you!
